Sail on a course of 232.5º (坤申, WSW) & 202.5º (丁未, SSW) for 7.2 hours to (3 更)  reach Tanhu Island (灘山 mislabeled as 霍山). Sail on a course of 180º (午, due south) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Donghuo Island (霍山). Sail on a course of 180º (午, due south) for 14.4 hours (6 更) to reach Xihoumen (西後門). Sail on a course of 142.5° (巽巳, SSE) for 7.2 hours (3 更) to reach Damao Island (大磨山). Follow the 7 fathom (9-9.5 托) contour all the way. There is a reef making waves extending from Jiushan (九山) toward the southwest. Sail carefully as you exit.

You sight Chashan on the northeast side; After passing it steer 135-150 degrees; after 4 watches the ship sights Da (Daqishan, 30o 48' N) and Xiao qishan (Hen and Chicks). Take a sounding, 6 or 7 fathoms. Steer 225-240 degrees, then 195-210 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Tanshan (Tanhushan). Steer exactly 180 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Heshan (Dongheshan, 30o 15' N). Steering exactly 180 degrees, the ship enters Xihoumen (Blackwall pass). Steer 135-150 degrees; after 3 watches the ship makes Damoshan (Damaoshan, 29o 56' N). Steer 105-120 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Xiaomoshan (Xiaomaoshan), rounds Qitou 29o 53' N), and makes Shenglexu (Xingleshan). Steer 195-210 degrees. After 1 watch the ship goes out through Shangxu jiang (Duffield pass). Steer 165-180 degrees. After 1 watch the ship makes Xiaoshunyang (northern portion of Niubishan channel). Take soundings all along the route. The depth is 9 fathoms when you are level with Jiushan (Kueshan) islands. Opposite to Jiushan on the southwest side there is one sunken rock which shows above the water when the waves break on it (Heijiao, Holderness rocks). Navigate the ship carefully in all directions.

Look for Hua'ao Island (大佛頭山) on the west side. When you are level with Dongxi qi shan (Dong Jishan and Gaodao), steer 195-180 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Qishan (Daqishan, 30º 48' N) Steer 315-330 degrees. After 4 watches the ship sights Chashan. Steer 285-270 degrees. After 3 watches the ship makes Nanhuizui, leaves the main, and comes level with Baoshan (Zhaobaoshan, near Gaoqiao).

Map Text: 在華蓋星五指內，去到北長星四指。 坐斗上。 山扮，坐癸丑針，六十五更船，取《葛兒得風》《哈甫兒雨》。
In English: At 5.4° S latitude, go to 10.3° N. Ride on a course toward the rising of Dipper (斗). When mountains appear, sail on a course of 22.5° (癸丑, NNE) for 6.5 days (65 更) to reach Cape Guardafui (葛得兒風, mistakenly written as 葛兒得風) and Xaafuun (哈甫兒雨).
JVG Mills: [From (uncorrected) 3° 12' S, near the equator, to (uncorrected) 10° 26' N, latitude of Ras al Kalb in Arabia] [f. 19v] '[When you are] in [the latitude where the altitude of the] Hua kai star [is] less than 5 fingers [(uncorrected) 3° 12' S] [and] are going to [the latitude where the altitude of the] Pei ch'en star [is] 4 fingers [(uncorrected) 6° 25' N], you set [your course] upon the Tou [star] [Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta of Ursa Major]. When mountains appear, you set a compass[-course] of 15°-30°. [After] 65 watches the ship reaches Ko-erh-te-feng [Guardafui], [which is] Ha-fu-erh-yü ['Hafun'].'
Map Text HTML:
• 在華蓋星五指內，去到北長星四指。
  • 坐斗上。
  • 山扮，坐癸丑針，六十五更船，取《葛兒得風》《哈甫兒雨》。
Translation HTML:
• At 5.4° S latitude, go to 10.3° N.

  • When mountains appear, sail on a course of 22.5° (癸丑, NNE) for 6.5 days (65 更) to reach Cape Guardafui (葛得兒風, mistakenly written as 葛兒得風) and Xaafuun (哈甫兒雨).

Map Text: 在三指，觜頭山勢。 去到六指二角直遶《那里》，(用)寅上(針)。 又在六指二角內山。 指坐《布司》上。 用丹艮(針)，十指去到十一指坐取船。
In English: At 9.7° N latitude, there are mountains. When going to 14.3° N, go straight around 'There' (那里) on a course above 60° (寅, ENE). Then, at a bit less than 14.3° N latitude, more mountains. Take a bearing on the rising of Bùsī Star (布司). Sail on a course of 45° (艮, NE) from 20.0° N latitude to 21.6° N.
JVG Mills: [From (uncorrected) 10° 26' N (near Ras Fartak) to (uncorrected) 21° 41' N (near As Salama)] [f. 20v] Going to [the latitude where the altitude of Pei ch'en is] 6 fingers 2 quarters [(uncorrected) 10 26' N], [you go] straight around that place on [a course of] 60.' . . . 'Again, [when you are] in [the latitude where the altitude is] 6 fingers 2 quarters, there will be mountains to landward [Fartak range].' [f. 21] 'Take a bearing and set your course on the Pu ssu star [Beta of Pegasus?];  steer exactly 45°; [travelling from the latitude where the altitude of Pei ch'en is] 10 fingers [(uncorrected) 16° 04' N] to [the latitude where it is] 11 fingers [(uncorrected) 17° 40' N], set [this course and] keep the ship on it.'-[f. 21v] 'The angle.
Map Text HTML:
• 在三指，觜頭山勢。
  • 去到六指二角直遶《那里》，(用)寅上(針)。
  • 又在六指二角內山。
  • 指坐《布司》上。
  • 用丹艮(針)，十指去到十一指坐取船。
Translation HTML:
• At 9.7° N latitude, there are mountains.
  • When going to 14.3° N, go straight around 'There' (那里) on a course above 60° (寅, ENE).
  • Then, at a bit less than 14.3° N latitude, more mountains.
  • Take a bearing on the rising of Bùsī Star (布司).
  • Sail on a course of 45° (艮, NE) from 20.0° N latitude to 21.6° N.

Map Text: 觜頭去到十二指，坐乾亥《小斗》落。 又在十二指觜頭去到十二指二角。 坐乾丹《布司》落。 又去到十二指觜頭，(用)子針五十更船收《忽魯莫斯》。
In English: Before going to 23.2° N latitude, ride on a course of 322.5° (乾亥, NNW) toward the setting of Dipper (小斗). Again, before you're at 23.2° N latitude, go to 24° N. Ride on a course of 315° (乾, NW) toward the setting of Bùsī star (布司). Again, before going to go to 23.2° N latitude, sail due north (子) for 5 days (50 更) to arrive at Hormuz (忽魯莫斯).
JVG Mills: When you are travelling to [the latitude where the altitude of Pei ch'en is] 12 fingers [(uncorrected) 19° 17' N], set a course of 315°-330°. The Hsiao tou star [in Hercules?] sets. Again, when you are in [the latitude where] the angle [of Pei ch'en is] 12 fingers and are travelling to [the latitude where it is] 12 fingers 2 quarters [(uncorrected) 20° 05' N], set a course of exactly 315°. The Pu ssu star [Formalhaut?] sets. Again, [f. 22] travel to [the latitude where] the angle [of Pei ch'en is] 12 fingers.
Map Text HTML:
• 觜頭去到十二指，坐乾亥《小斗》落。
  • 又在十二指觜頭去到十二指二角。
  • 坐乾丹《布司》落。
  • 又去到十二指觜頭，(用)子針五十更船收《忽魯莫斯》。
Translation HTML:
• Before going to 23.2° N latitude, ride on a course of 322.5° (乾亥, NNW) toward the setting of Dipper (小斗).
  • Again, before you're at 23.2° N latitude, go to 24° N.
  • Ride on a course of 315° (乾, NW) toward the setting of Bùsī star (布司).
  • Again, before going to go to 23.2° N latitude, sail due north (子) for 5 days (50 更) to arrive at Hormuz (忽魯莫斯).
